name: Lost in Wonderland
description:
Alyss Woodbridge is your typical teen who was looking forward to a summer with her friends. However, when her father goes missing, she is stuck on babysitting duty. What was supposed to be a week helping her mom with her sister turns into something more sinister when a freak accident sends Alyss to a world in between this one and the next. 

**This game is still in development. This is the third revision of the game. We are still combing through looking for any errors.
